article_node.title: White House advances plan for Department of War as Trump looks to restore historical military title
article_node.summary: The White House announced plans to rename the Department of Defense to the Department of War, reflecting a shift toward an offensive military posture. Trump and the administration emphasize restoring historical naming and streamlining Pentagon bureaucracy, citing a new NDAA with acquisition reforms. The move is tied to a broader agenda of boosting defense spending and reducing bureaucratic red tape, with a potential legislative change expected within weeks. The announcement follows Trump’s rhetoric on military readiness and has sparked debate over the need for congressional approval.
